title: Motroninskoe Gorodishche
description: At Motroninskoe Gorodishche in Mielniki (central Ukraine, obl. Cherkassy) an early Iron Age fortified settlement has been identified. The ancient site was a large settlement of the ancient Scythians.

properties.description: Representative point location determined via analysis of Google Earth imagery with reference to published site plans.
properties.title: Imagery location of Motroninskoe Gorodishche
